short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: [It's hard to describe. You really have to try it out.]

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever found yourself getting a little annoyed when you're hit with a random story about the Kardashian while casually browsing the webs ?This extension will replace all members from the Kardashian family with a Star Wars character. Boost your mood effectively.
